name: Fleet
description: Safety, dependability and comfort drive our services at Namma Shipping Lines and ensure that our customers are satisfied because their needs are met. We believe that a strong fleet with comfortable and affordable accommodations along with the services our customers need, is crucial to ensuring a safe, pleasant journey. Below are details  about the fleet, both passenger and cargo vessels.
